author: Slidebean
description:
Disney’s OpenAI deal signals a new model for IP in the AI era.

Disney’s decision to license its entire IP catalog to OpenAI, while investing heavily in the company, marks a turning point in the relationship between AI and entertainment.
Rather than resisting generative tools through litigation, Disney is monetizing access within controlled guardrails.

The implication is profound:
intellectual property is no longer just content, it’s platform infrastructure.
Other studios now face a choice: license their worlds, or risk being left out of the ecosystem entirely.

👉 Visit our YouTube channel for more content.
title: Disney didn’t fight AI it bought into it.
